name: Endhall (itch)
description:
Endhall is a game about comboing skills in interesting ways to destroy the enemies in each new hallway.

This game is in a BETA state.

DO NOT buy it unless you are willing to help find bugs and wait for the game to be completed. If you purchase it you can request a Steam key when the game is finished and released on Steam.

Feel free to email me (heartbeast.studios@gmail.com) if you find any bugs of have suggestions.
